name: H.E.A.T. Lizard
description:
High Explosive Anti-Tank (HEAT) Lizard

Defend your desert against the invading tanks but be sure to manage your temperature. Seek shade to cool off but be sure to complete your mission in a timely manner; the day is only getting hotter!

Space to fire

Mouse to aim

Hold left click to move

Right click to boost

Esc to pause
